name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_RF_VERIFY
description: This table contains the verification number for the radio-frequency device used during a count.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_RF_VERIFY_NUM
columns.description: The verification number for the radio-frequency device.
